text: Hello! I am being flagged for 404s that include the URL slug "/hubfs/" which does not allow me to create redirects in HubSpot due the URL being "reserved." I also cannot find any corresponding files in the File Manager. Is there a way to fix this 404?

<@U04R4ULJW04> hi sorry for the delayed response! Unfortunately, I have not found a way to resolve this issue yet. I don't want to redirect every single page especially if it's not actually a 404 page but is getting marked as one.
